content.query:
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD ='Year@2023'

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL Accessdp203adls2
WITH IDENTITY='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET='sv=2022-11-02&ss=b&srt=sco&sp=rwlx&se=2024-07-12T14:51:45Z&st=2024-07-12T06:51:45Z&spr=https&sig=Uqxzr533%2BCylOariCY2b4XRXEP3yVeM1F1w%2F8oYkFHE%3D';

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE srcActivityLogParquet
WITH 
(
    LOCATION='https://dp203adls2.blob.core.windows.net/mydata',
    CREDENTIAL = Accessdp203adls2
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT parquetFileFormat
WITH(
    FORMAT_TYPE=PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
);

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ActivityLog
(
   [Correlationid] varchar(200),
   [Operationname] varchar(300),
   [Status] varchar(100),
   [Eventcategory] varchar(100),
   [Level] varchar(100),
   [Time] varchar(100),
   [Subscription] varchar(200),
   [Eventinitiatedby] varchar(1000),
   [Resourcetype] varchar(300),
   [Resourcegroup] varchar(1000),
   [Resource] varchar(2000))
WITH (
    LOCATION='/ActivityLog-01.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE=srcActivityLogParquet,
    FILE_FORMAT=parquetFileFormat
)


select * from ActivityLog
